src:
DANA Gelar Parade, Sudirman-Thamrin Membiru
03 Nov 2019, 17:59 by Adinda Purnama Rachmani - detikInet


Parade DANA 11.11 di sepanjang Jalan Sudirman–Thamrin, Minggu, (3/11/2019)/ Foto: Adinda Purnama Rachmani

Jakarta - DANA menggelar parade di Car Free Day (CFD) Sudirman-Bundaran HI, Jakarta Pusat. Parade ini untuk memeriahkan perayaan 'The Singels' Day 11.11', menyambut Pesta DANA 11.11 dan program #Puas11Rupiah. Ratusan peserta parade bergerak berjalan kaki dari Semanggi dan berakhir di Bundaran HI dimulai pukul 08.30 WIB, Minggu (3/11/2019). Para peserta mengenakan kaos biru dan membawa beragam poster mengkampanyekan program #Puas11Rupiah yang akan diadakan pada 8-11 November 2019. Ada ribuan peserta parade yang turun ke jalan. Mereka berasal dari berbagai komunitas dan elemen masyarakat, serta keluarga besar DANA. Dalam parade tersebut, masyarakat yang sedang beraktivitas di CFD dihibur dengan penampilan marching band dan berbagai permainan.


CEO DANA Vincent Iswara dan Petinggi DANA lainnya menggunakan DANA Box dalam Parade DANA 11.11 di Jalan Sudirman-Thamrin, Minggu, (3/11/2019) / Foto: Adinda Purnama Rachmani

Sementara itu CEO DANA Vincent Iswara yang ikut dalam parade itu menaiki replika mesin transaksi DANA (DANA Box) berukuran besar. Vincent mengatakan momen ini akan menjadi momen tahunan. Ia berharap, nantinya momentum 11.11 bisa menjadi perayaan 'Indonesia Cashless Society'. "Dalam parade ini kami memberikan informasi, kalau ini akan menjadi Indonesia Cashless Society Day yang akan diadakan setiap tahun. Semoga acara seperti ini akan berulang, agar masyarakat tahu kalau ini dimulai dari Indonesia Cashless Day 11.11," ucap Vincent di Kawasan MH Thamrin, Jakarta Pusat. Parade ini, yang digelar untuk menyambut Pesta DANA 11.11 pada tanggal 8-11 November mendatang, lanjut Vincent, juga menjadi momen perayaan tahunan yang diadakan untuk mempertegas kehadiran DANA sebagai infrastruktur pembayaran digital."Acara ini juga sebagai momentum istimewa bagi setiap pelaku ekonomi di Indonesia, untuk melakukan transformasi digital. Melalui perayaan ini, kami optimistis kesadaran dan kepercayaan semua penggerak perekonomian di Indonesia terhadap kemudahan, keandalan, dan keamanan serta jaminan pada dompet digital kami akan makin meningkat," jelas Vincent. (ega/ega)
text:
DANA Holds Parade, Sudirman-Thamrin Turns Blue
03 Nov 2019, 17:59 by Adinda Purnama Rachmani - detikInet


DANA 11.11 Parade along Jalan Sudirman – Thamrin, Sunday, (11/3/2019) / Photo: Adinda Purnama Rachmani

Jakarta - DANA held a parade at the Car Free Day (CFD) Sudirman-Bundaran HI, Central Jakarta. This parade is to enliven the celebration of 'The Singels' Day 11.11', welcoming the Feast of 11.11 FUNDS and # # Satisfaction program for the Rupiah. Hundreds of parade participants walked on foot from Semanggi and ended at HI Roundabout starting at 08.30 WIB, Sunday (11/03/2019). Participants wearing blue shirts and carrying various posters are campaigning for the # Satisfaction program for the Rupiah which will be held on 8-11 November 2019. There are thousands of parade participants taking to the streets. They come from various communities and elements of society, as well as the family of DANA. In the parade, people who were active in CFD were entertained by marching band performances and various games.


DANA CEO Vincent Iswara and other DANA officials use DANA Box in the 11.11 DANA Parade on Jalan Sudirman-Thamrin, Sunday, (3/11/2019) / Photo: Adinda Purnama Rachmani

Meanwhile DANA CEO Vincent Iswara who participated in the parade was riding a large-sized replica of the DANA (DANA Box) transaction machine. Vincent said this moment will become an annual moment. He hopes, later 11.11 momentum can become a celebration of 'Indonesia Cashless Society'. "In this parade we provide information, that this will be the Indonesia Cashless Society Day which will be held every year. Hopefully this kind of event will be repeated, so that the public knows that it started with Indonesia Cashless Day 11.11," said Vincent in MH Thamrin, Jakarta Center. This parade, which was held to welcome the 11.11 FUN Party on November 8-11, continued Vincent, also became a moment of annual celebration held to reinforce the presence of FUND as a digital payment infrastructure. "This event is also a special momentum for every economic actor in Indonesia "To carry out digital transformation. Through this celebration, we are optimistic that the awareness and trust of all economic drivers in Indonesia in the ease, reliability and security and guarantees of our digital wallets will increase," explained Vincent. (ega / ega)
